title: Loading Tkinter in Python for Rhino 8
question: Is tkinter not supported in Rhino’s script editor? I’ve tried installing with # r: tkinter as well as with pip but neither are working. I have been able to install matplotlib just fine.

code_blocks.code:
#! python3

import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
import scriptcontext as sc
import math

import System
import System.Collections.Generic
import Rhino

import tkinter

tkinter._test()
